title: AVESCOIN
author: AVESCOIN
content: We inform the community that our ICO offer started and will last until Feb 20.2023. Our blockchain is alive and all infrastructure for it, even the NFT marketplace.ICO offer page is:https://ico.avescoin.ioOur main page is:https://avescoin.ioAves is a hard fork of the previous Ethereum with all security benefits, also has reduced gas fees, so we have faster and bigger TPS.For any questions ask us through mail, or community links which are presented on our pages.Let decentralization live!REGARDS

comments.author: AVESCOIN
comments.created_time: December 15, 2022, 09:16:51 AMLast edit: December 16, 2022, 02:24:15 PM by AVESCOIN
comments.body: Quote from: AVESCOIN on December 14, 2022, 09:27:25 PMWe inform the community that our ICO offer started and will last until Feb 20.2023. Our blockchain is alive and all infrastructure for it, even the NFT marketplace.ICO offer page is:https://ico.avescoin.ioOur main page is:https://avescoin.ioAves is a hard fork of the previous Ethereum with all security benefits, also has reduced gas fees, so we have faster and bigger TPS.For any questions ask us through mail, or community links which are presented on our pages.Let decentralization live!REGARDSAdditional info about AVES. Our chain has a lower gas fee and TPS higher than Ethereum POW, we are also faster, and the block time is 10 seconds or less. We just finished NFT marketplace, also we soon will finish encrypted smart contracts. The idea is to verified sellers can sell their own intellectual properties through smart contracts, and buyers can be safe from fraud. Soon we will offer that system to big companies, like YouTube, Netflix, etc. The chained project with AVES is a banking system which we developing now with a speed 10k, and we plan to offer that to banks. The system is bulletproof, and cannot be hacked and we think that's is the real deal. Community support is very important to us. All money collected from ICO goes to the market listing. Our paycheck and all expensive finance my company payments. We have from this nothing (I know seems crazy, but it's true).

comments.author: jharris9931
comments.body: I have a few questions for you.1. It seems your discord is down. Can you double check the invite link on your website?2. The ICO for this token/coin is $2 per coin. Please explain how you came up with this number?3. How many token/coins have been pre-mined or will be pre-mined?4. For transparency, what is the wallet address for the pre-mine? 5. Also, what is the wallet address for the developers used for reserves to pay for future development?6. Running an ICO for 2 months in an extremely long time. When can regular miners start mining?7. The domain name avescoin.io is only two months old. It's difficult to put in a lot of trust into a company that wants $2 per coin for their initial offering. Are you part of another company?That's it for now.Best of luck.

comments.author: AVESCOIN
comments.created_time: December 16, 2022, 02:16:24 PMLast edit: December 16, 2022, 05:03:02 PM by AVESCOIN
comments.body: Quote from: jharris9931 on December 16, 2022, 12:22:33 PMI have a few questions for you.1. It seems your discord is down. Can you double check the invite link on your website?2. The ICO for this token/coin is $2 per coin. Please explain how you came up with this number?3. How many token/coins have been pre-mined or will be pre-mined?4. For transparency, what is the wallet address for the pre-mine? 5. Also, what is the wallet address for the developers used for reserves to pay for future development?6. Running an ICO for 2 months in an extremely long time. When can regular miners start mining?7. The domain name avescoin.io is only two months old. It's difficult to put in a lot of trust into a company that wants $2 per coin for their initial offering. Are you part of another company?That's it for now.Best of luck.Thank you for your questions, let me start from the beginningThe discord link is here:  https://discord.gg/NDhQBnWBVYThe price of the coin is calculated per the quality of our project and market, 2 dollars price is in the time of ICO, the full price is 3 dollars per AVS, and blockchain is only top of all projects which we doing (everything you can check in our pages)Premined address is here  0xA75Bd5d4f25b388DA9b17f3aa3ef604e3aabAEF5 you can check that at https://avescan.ioDevelopers and reserves, for now, are financed by my company (and I have a lot of money loss)Ico is planned for 2 months because we need a significant amount of money to get quality market exchanges, also there is no quick money anywhere, it will be suspicious if is ICO very short time(I did not want some shady exchange for a few k dollars and the risk of project failure)The web page is 2 months old, that is true because we starting before 2 months but my company page/domain is 11 years old, and the company is 30 years old you can check this https://www.marant.hrMiners will start to mine after ICO offer, the reason is simple, many coins start mining before market listing and they come to market all miners dump coins in a short time, and then prices go down with the speed of lightIf you have more questions please post here or on our discord.Best regards

comments.author: jharris9931
comments.body: Quote1. The discord link is here:  https://discord.gg/NDhQBnWBVYThanks the discord works. But have been my ISP.Quote2. The price of the coin is calculated per the quality of our project and market, 2 dollars price is in the time of ICO, the full price is 3 dollars per AVS, and blockchain is only top of all projects which we doing (everything you can check in our pages)I still do not get how you have up with $3 with a 33% discount. So many newer coins are coming out in the pennies but for some reason you think this coin will be $2 to $3.  There are so many ETH blockchains with the prices in the pennies.Quote3. Pre-mined address is here  0xA75Bd5d4f25b388DA9b17f3aa3ef604e3aabAEF5 you can check that at https://avescan.ioFound it. Thanks.Quote4. Developers and reserves, for now, are financed by my company (and I have a lot of money loss)What company is that?Quote5. Ico is planned for 2 months because we need a significant amount of money to get quality market exchanges, also there is no quick money anywhere, it will be suspicious if is ICO very short time(I did not want some shady exchange for a few k dollars and the risk of project failure)Pre-mining is fine to have reserves so you can pay for things in the future when the price of the coin goes up. Having an ICO where you charge $2 a coin is very suspicious. To many new coins run a ICO and run after a week or so.Quote6. The web page is 2 months old, that is true because we starting before 2 months but my company page/domain is 11 years old, and the company is 30 years old you can check this https://www.marant.hrThe domain name avescoin.io is only 2 months old. It was created on 2022-10-31T12:22:04Z according to https://www.whois.com/whois/avescoin.io. Why are you telling people it's 11 years old?I did some digging into marant.hr. There was a so so website back in 2017 and the current site was done in 2020. I looked through marant.hr and no mention of avescoin. Why is that? It might be more believable if you add avescoin onto marant.hr.Quote7. Miners will start to mine after ICO offer, the reason is simple, many coins start mining before market listing and they come to market all miners dump coins in a short time, and then prices go down with the speed of lightIt's usually the other way around with ICO coins. You hype up the coins, sell during ICO, open to miners after ICO and dump the coins.

comments.author: AVESCOIN
comments.created_time: December 17, 2022, 02:46:09 AMLast edit: December 17, 2022, 03:02:25 AM by AVESCOIN
comments.body: Quote from: jharris9931 on December 16, 2022, 10:38:46 PMQuote1. The discord link is here:  https://discord.gg/NDhQBnWBVYThanks the discord works. But have been my ISP.Quote2. The price of the coin is calculated per the quality of our project and market, 2 dollars price is in the time of ICO, the full price is 3 dollars per AVS, and blockchain is only top of all projects which we doing (everything you can check in our pages)I still do not get how you have up with $3 with a 33% discount. Developers and reserves, for now, are financed by my company (and I have a lot of money loss)What company is that?Quote5. Ico is planned for 2 months because we need a significant amount of money to get quality market exchanges, also there is no quick money anywhere, it will be suspicious if is ICO very short time(I did not want some shady exchange for a few k dollars and the risk of project failure)Pre-mining is fine to have reserves so you can pay for things in the future when the price of the coin goes up. Having an ICO where you charge $2 a coin is very suspicious. To many new coins run a ICO and run after a week or so.Quote6. The web page is 2 months old, that is true because we starting before 2 months but my company page/domain is 11 years old, and the company is 30 years old you can check this https://www.marant.hrThe domain name avescoin.io is only 2 months old. It was created on 2022-10-31T12:22:04Z according to https://www.whois.com/whois/avescoin.io. Why are you telling people it's 11 years old?I did some digging into marant.hr. There was a so so website back in 2017 and the current site was done in 2020. I looked through marant.hr and no mention of avescoin. Why is that? It might be more believable if you add avescoin onto marant.hr.Quote7. Miners will start to mine after ICO offer, the reason is simple, many coins start mining before market listing and they come to market all miners dump coins in a short time, and then prices go down with the speed of lightIt's usually the other way around with ICO coins. You hype up the coins, sell during ICO, open to miners after ICO and dump the coins.I really I not know what is not clear, sir.  My company web page seems you are not looking at all because there you have the link blockchain and under that is the main page of AVES.The domain for my company is registered first time 11 years ago (before that it was another name) https://whois.domaintools.com/marant.hrWe are in the EU and there are laws for crypto already regulated, so I'm a little tired of anonymous people who want to take us down.So tell me what kind of logic is that when you report your company for the project to the government and after that ruin our own project?If a may speak freely, mate seems you are the same person who try to bring down our testing pool and chain, and also the same person who came on discord to spread lies.Honestly, I think you have some kind of problem. So if you have a lot of free time for writing on social media I will gladly take you in our crew, you can see all for self also you can do something good instead of spitting on our hard work. If you did not want to volunteer with us I asked politely to not write nonsense because I will not answer you anymoreRegardsP.S. price is calculated on market needs and quality of the project, if you really read our pages then you see, that we developing a banking system project Warden, developing a web3 email system, also we are first in encrypted NFTs, for selling intellectual rights. Also, this is not some shitcoin for a price of 0.00000001 dollars or less. Satoshi had pre-mined coins, no one talking about that, Ethereum had pre-mined coins, no one talking about that. We are here building something for the community, to make a better life for all and you come to spit and troll? Shame on you sir . Our conversation is over. I wish you much luck in life

comments.author: AVESCOIN
comments.body: We just implemented a module for selling smart contracts and intellectual properties in any known format. Soon our NFT market will have things that had never been seen before. Our chain is very fast so deploying, selling and buying NFT going smoothly.Our NFT market page is https://avescoin.networkSTAY TUNED!Regards

comments.author: wiewiewie
comments.body: One priced at $2, funny, clown, who gave you the courage to price it at $2, your team looks like it's ready to cheat and run away for Christmas?The eyes of the masses are shining, so please, you cheating clowns, go back to your embryos and reincarnate.

comments.author: AVESCOIN
comments.created_time: December 22, 2022, 10:38:58 AMLast edit: December 24, 2022, 06:45:36 AM by AVESCOIN
comments.body: Quote from: wiewiewie on December 22, 2022, 07:07:48 AMOne priced at $2, funny, clown, who gave you the courage to price it at $2, your team looks like it's ready to cheat and run away for Christmas?The eyes of the masses are shining, so please, you cheating clowns, go back to your embryos and reincarnate.Thank you for your opinion full of good manners.Price is calculated with several factors: Demand market for good POW coin;Speed of our chain (which is bigger than most other Ethereum forks) Presence of software for mining Ethash algo;Quality of project (crew experience, legal company presence, other chained projects with AVES)Block reward which is 3 AVS per block (and 5% going to Eco funds, that mean block reward is 2,85AVS); Also if the price is under a minimum of 2 dollars there will not be any earnings for miners

comments.author: tonidev
comments.body: QuoteThe domain name avescoin.io is only 2 months old. It was created on 2022-10-31T12:22:04Z according to https://www.whois.com/whois/avescoin.io. Why are you telling people it's 11 years old?I did some digging into marant.hr. There was a so so website back in 2017 and the current site was done in 2020. I looked through marant.hr and no mention of avescoin. Why is that? It might be more believable if you add avescoin onto marant.hr.Company is was founded in 1992 and domain in 2011.You can see aves on our webiste https://www.marant.hr/blockchain/Best regards Toni Dumancic CTO
